Package com.airg.android.device

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ApiLevel
    This class provides some basic API level checks
    Assert
    Created by mahramf.
    Cameras
    This class provides some common camera-related queries.
    Connectivity
    This class provides common network connectivity tasks.
    Device
    This class provides common answers about the device.
    Keyboard
    This class provides some common soft-keyboard functionality.
    PreferenceStore
    A SharedPreferences implementation with a few extra features.
    PreferenceStore.PreferenceEditor
    An implementation of Editor with a few additions.
    UnitConverter
    This class provides methods to convert between different size units in Android.
